word: 風 (wind) 風邪(cold). The latter is some sort of ateji.
怪我, a case of ateji
漆喰, a case of ateji. Originally it was石灰.
容赦/用捨 (the former is now usual)
葉書、older variants　端書、羽書、判書
びっくり・吃驚 (the latter a case of ateji)
伯母　(parent’s elder brother)、叔母(parent’s younger brother)
従兄弟 (usually in hiragana. In kanji, the characters given are most common, but appropriate characters can be used to indicate gender and relative age of the cousin)
お祖父さん (grandfather) お爺さん (old man)
お祖母さん (grandmother) お婆さん (old woman)
伯父　(parent’s elder brother)、叔父(parent’s younger brother)
イチジク・無花果・映日果
バナナ　（obsolete kanji 実芭蕉）
捻子、捩子、螺旋、螺子 (all seem to be ateji)
工場, note that this is written the same as kōjō which is a bigger factory.
マットレス、　敷布団
上る (go up in general) 登る (climb)　昇る(rise)
お祖父さん (grandfather) お爺さん (old man)
お祖母さん (grandmother) お婆さん (old woman)
吼える・吠える・咆える
缶 (a case of ateji), older variants: 罐、鑵
